title: Welcome to NodePassDash
subtitle: Let's take a few minutes to complete the initial setup

step1.title: Choose Your Preferences

theme.label: Interface Theme
theme.description: Click to select a theme and preview instantly

step2.title: Set Up Your Account
step2.description: Default credentials detected. For security, please update your username and password immediately

newPassword.label: New Password
newPassword.description: At least 6 characters, should include letters, numbers and symbols

securityTips.tip1: Do not use the same password as the default password
securityTips.tip2: Use a strong password with uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special characters
securityTips.tip3: You will need to sign in again after completing setup

step3.title: Configure Features
step3.description: Enable or disable the following features based on your needs, can be modified in settings later

privacyMode.title: Privacy Mode
privacyMode.description: When enabled, automatically masks sensitive information such as IP addresses to protect your privacy

experimentalMode.title: Experimental Features
experimentalMode.description: Enable new features under testing, may be unstable, not recommended for production environments

errors.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all required fields

errors.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters
errors.sameAsDefault: New password cannot be the same as the default password
errors.networkError: Network error, please try again later

success.title: Setup Complete
